Name: Badge of Glory
AttributesDescription: A souvenir badge for travelers in Septimont. Can be used to advance reward progress in Gifts of Glory.
BgDescription: The Agon Medals are a mark of honor for the people of Septimont. Over time, they have become one of the symbols of the city itself. Inspired by that, this souvenir badge lets travelers carry home a piece of Septimont's fiery spirit. Even far away from Septimont, they can still hear the echo of battle in their hearts.
ObtainedShowDescription: A souvenir badge for travelers in Septimont. Can be used to advance reward progress in Gifts of Glory.
